subNode:value.scalar:string: Allow customers to upload files using the contact page.
Please fill out the message fields that appear by default when you answer a thread on the customer service page.
Port to use to connect to IMAP server
User to use to connect to IMAP server
Password used to connect IMAP server
Delete messages after sync. If you do not active this option, the sync will take more time.
Create new threads for unrecognized emails
Do not use RSH or SSH to establish a preauthenticated IMAP sessions.
Use the Secure Socket Layer to encrypt the session.
Validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server
Do not validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server. This is only needed if a server uses self-signed certificates
Force use of start-TLS to encrypt the session, and reject connection to servers that do not support it.
Do not use start-TLS to encrypt the session, even with servers that support it.

CONCAT(c.`firstname`," ",c.`lastname`) as customer, cl.`name` as contact, l.`name` as language, group_concat(message) as messages, ( SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(LEFT(e.`firstname`, 1),". ",e.`lastname`), "--") FROM `
employee e ON e.`id_employee` = cm2.`id_employee` WHERE cm2.id_employee > 0 AND cm2.`id_customer_thread` = a.`id_customer_thread` ORDER BY cm2.`date_add` DESC LIMIT 1 ) as employee
customer` c ON c.`id_customer` = a.`id_customer` LEFT JOIN `
customer_message` cm ON cm.`id_customer_thread` = a.`id_customer_thread` LEFT JOIN `
lang` l ON l.`id_lang` = a.`id_lang` LEFT JOIN `
contact_lang` cl ON (cl.`id_contact` = a.`id_contact` AND cl.`id_lang` =
SELECT ct.*, cm.*, cl.name subject, CONCAT(e.firstname, ' ', e.lastname) employee_name, CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) customer_name, c.firstname FROM
customer_message cm ON (ct.id_customer_thread = cm.id_customer_thread) LEFT JOIN
contact_lang cl ON (cl.id_contact = ct.id_contact AND cl.id_lang =
employee e ON e.id_employee = cm.id_employee LEFT OUTER JOIN
customer c ON (c.email = ct.email) WHERE ct.id_customer_thread =
An error occurred during the file upload process.
